card.note: You will love, not only that you will grow and stretch more than you ever thought possible, but you will make memories, friends and discoveries that will last a lifetime.
card.author: Love & Laughter, Mom

card.note: One thing Megan will love about college is the freedom to make choices and new friendships. Remember that your old friends were there for you through thick and thin while coming into yourself , and that there is no greater gift than family. Enjoy and good luck.
card.author: Maggie Baisch

card.note: You'll be on a great adventure,preparing for the next phase of your life. I know you'll succeed. I love you MORE!
card.author: Love, GRAMMY

card.note: Dad won't be able to see what you do on the internet anymore.
card.author: Brendan "Boony" King

card.note: One thing Megan will love about college is that she'll be even more excited to see Beau, and he'll be more excited to see her.
card.author: Kellen King

card.note: One thing I know you will love about college is being independent. It's an amazing experience to finally be on your own and make your own decisions about your life. You are a mature and responsible young lady and I know that you will be a success. I am so proud of you.
card.author: with lots of love, cousin Lisa

card.note: Megan,/RWe hope you enjoy the freedom to explore academic subjects that inspire you and bring you joy! Best wishes for a wonderful college experience!
card.author: The Martin family

card.note: Ohlala…! ça c'est difficile! il y a tellement de choses que Megan aimera. Megan will love her new acquired freedom, not that she is lacking any now, but she'll thrive at "organizing" this new element in her life, while savoring her favorite crepe at a petit Café!
card.author: Maggy-Noelle

card.note: How many people there are to meet and get to know -- and how many of them know and love things that will be different and exciting and interesting. It feels like you can learn something new everyday, just by talking to whoever crosses your path.
card.author: Becky

card.note: Nights staying up late for no good reason except that there's good company and good conversation -- and a sense that those moments are meant to be enjoyed.
card.author: Becky

card.note: what's not to love about college? staying up way too late whenever you want, wearing shorts and t-shirts everyday, all hours dining halls, making friends that you will cherish the rest of your life/Rfollowing your passion.../Rfinding yourself.../Rwe love YOU!
card.author: xoxo~ kk, bridget and ali

card.note: One thing you will love about college is you will find me in all kinds of places...and then you'll smile ;-)
card.author: Love Beau <3

card.note: You will have the /Rtime of your life /Ron this next grand adventure /Ras you go to college /Rto get more knowledge! /RTime will pass quickly, /Rso make the most of each day /Rand every opportunity. /RWe love you... /Rand don't you forget it!!
card.author: CC, Jerry, and Toney

card.note: One thing Megan will love about college is the freedom to choose - just don't choose parties and marathon Trivial Pursuit games over studying ALL the time.
card.author: Love - The San Antonio Kings

card.note: Megan,/RWe all know that you will have a GREAT college experience! Your accomplishments to date have been nothing but fabulous. You have already proved that you can do anything that you desire and I know this fact will be true for you in this next stage of your life. (:
card.author: Ken (Charlotte,Madeline & Marci)

card.note: Megan,/RPlease be sure to bring your awesome sense of humor to college as I am sure you will notice...EVERYTHING! ... Also bring your kind giving heart, your listening ear, your amazing storytelling abilities and your mad talent for making tiny clay donuts! Have fun!
card.author: Heidi Eickemeyer

card.note: Megan/RI hope you love EVERYTHING about college!!!!/RI am so excited for you to discover all the amazing things that are ahead for you./RCongratulations!!!/RXOXO/R
card.author: Aunt Marci

card.note: We hope you have a fun time at College, we will miss you!/R/R
card.author: Love, Madeline and Charlotte

card.note: Megan will love learning and making new friends. Wherever and whatever, she will carry a sense of care and justice with her. She's a learner and a wonderful person; that's a pretty powerful combination! I look forward to her making a difference in the world.
card.author: Tom Hoerr, from New City School

card.note: One thing Megan will love about college is not having to wake up early and drive us to school every morning.
card.author: Kellen

card.note: Your secret mac and cheese runs won't have to be so secret anymore
card.author: Brendan "Boony" King

card.note: You'll love your independence! But, Brendan is mistaken. I'll still be able to see what you do on the Internet!/R/R
card.author: Dad

card.note: You will love SO many things about college. I understand you mature more with your newly acquired independence, discover the meaning of life, maybe go to a party. Remember, when you meet someone with a graceful long neck, it will warm your heart and you'll think of me
card.author: Love <3 Cody CocoNeck

card.note: You're not a child, yet you're not expected to be an adult either: you get to live in a splendid twilight zone of experimentation for an eternal FOUR years... /R(Hint: this won't happen again)./R/R/R
card.author: Frederick J Kuhn (super genius)

card.note: Sweet Megan one thing you will love about college is making lifelong friends!! We love you and are so proud of you!
card.author: The Logans -TLLJS xoxo

card.note: Megan, you've always made every stop along your way a better place. You're an awesome friend, a stellar student, a rare, truly good person...college is going to love you!
card.author: Dad

card.note: You'll love the long nights spent studying, the new ideas, great professors, lively debates, challenges, the thrill of discovery, finding a love for things you didn't know existed, learning about yourself from a whole new perspective. Like when I went to Happy Tails.
card.author: Beau
